Let’s Talk

HAS Hygiene

Overview

HAS Hygiene is a modern, responsive portfolio website built to showcase the services, values, and brand identity of a cleaning and hygiene company. The goal of the website was to establish a credible and professional digital presence that reflects the company’s commitment to cleanliness, customer satisfaction, and service excellence.

The site features a clean and minimal design, intuitive navigation, and well-structured content sections, including company information, service categories, customer testimonials, and a contact form. I focused on creating a layout that is visually appealing and easy to use, especially for non-technical visitors who may be accessing the site from mobile devices.

Technically, the website is fully responsive, ensuring that it functions smoothly across all screen sizes — from desktops to tablets and smartphones. I used clean HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript to build a lightweight and performance-optimized frontend. Animations and scroll effects are used subtly to enhance user experience without compromising speed.

The contact section includes a fully functional form, enabling visitors to easily reach out for service inquiries or quotes. Additionally, clear call-to-action buttons and strategically placed service highlights help convert visitors into potential customers.

This project not only helped build a strong digital identity for HAS Hygiene but also allowed me to apply my frontend development skills in real-world client work — delivering a polished, reliable, and brand-aligned website that meets both business and user needs.
